title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 382 - REGULATION OF LOW-LEVEL RADIOACTIVE WASTE DISPOSAL FACILITIES
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 382 - REGULATION OF LOW-LEVEL RADIOACTIVE WASTE DISPOSAL FACILITIES
State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 382.1 to 382.5)

Regulatory Procedures (§ 382.6)

Performance Objectives (§ 382.10 to 382.15)

Siting Criteria for Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Sites (§ 382.20 to 382.23)

Disposal Method Criteria (§ 382.30 to 382.35)

Waste Classification and Characteristics (§ 382.80 to 382.83)

Authority of Dec (§ 382.99)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. C, pt. 382

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, arts. 3, 17, 19, 27, 29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
